dict.acceptation: （为某目的或某段时间内的）花销，花费，开销；

sent.orig: Your brain conned to spend, spend, spend.
sent.trans: 你的大脑只知道花钱、花钱、花钱。

sent.orig: Money spend on the brain is never spend in vain.
People now have more money to spend and more things to spend it on.
sent.trans: 现在人们有更多的钱可以支配，也有更多的事物可以消费。

sent.orig: Many people spend their health for wealth, and then try to spend their wealth for health.
sent.trans: 许多人先利用健康去寻找财富，然后再尽力用财富换取健康。

sent.orig: Why spend 15 minutes driving to a gym to spend half an hour on a treadmill?
sent.trans: 为什么你开车用15分钟到健身馆去做半个小时的走步运动呢？
